name: Advanced Materials

pages.text: As you progress in TFC, you may want for stronger and prettier building materials, as well as some devices you may remember from vanilla. One such material is $(thing)Stone Bricks$(), which are made with $(thing)Bricks$() and $(thing)Mortar$()
To make mortar, $(thing)Limewater$() must first be made with $(thing)Water$() and $(l:mechanics/flux)Flux$() in a $(l:mechanics/barrel)Barrel$().
Then, combine it with $(thing)Sand$() to make mortar.
Bricks can be crafted from loose rocks in bulk with a $(l:mechanics/chisel)Chisel$(). These rocks can be made into $(thing)Pressure Plates$() and $(thing)Buttons$()
Finally, bricks and mortar can be combined into bricks. Bricks can be made into slabs, stairs, and walls.
Bricks can turned into cracked bricks with a $(thing)Hammer$().
Mortar can be used to make $(thing)Hardened Stone$(), a kind of raw stone that does not collapse.
